abstract: Ben Kenigsberg reviews movie We'll Never Have Paris, directed by Simon Helberg and Jocelyn Towne.
lead_paragraph: In “We’ll Never Have Paris,” a florist on the cusp of proposing to his longtime girlfriend begins to wonder what it would be like to see other women.
snippet: In “We’ll Never Have Paris,” a florist on the cusp of proposing to his longtime girlfriend begins to wonder what it would be like to see other women.

headline.main: Not Quite Sure About Happily Ever After
headline.seo: ‘We’ll Never Have Paris’ Stars Simon Helberg
